p: Ten further beech-soil-mesocosms were transferred (5 within the NW slope, 5 to the SW slope) to monitor soil temperature and soil moisture in 5 cm depth in the mesocosms (n = 5 each slope) using horizontally installed combined soil moisture/temperature probes (DECAGON EC-5, Decagon Devices, Inc., Pullman, USA) with an hourly temporal resolution.
